name: Relighter
description:
A short walking simulator by Josh Hirshfield and Matt Wang.  Intended to be played in one sitting. Windows version recommended for the best experience.

Controls

  • Mouse to look around.
  • WASD to walk. 
  • + Left Shift to run.
  • Left Click to interact with certain objects.
